zGallery JS

JavaScript functions that manipulate DOM on client-side and interact with JSON data from server-side

Summary
zGallery JSJavaScript functions that manipulate DOM on client-side and interact with JSON data from server-side
Constants
AJAX_PATHPath to PHP-files that get/send data from/to DB
jQuery
Functions
jQuery.document.readyAdjusts several visual (CSS) parameters and interface behaviour (clicks and more).
jQuery.window.resizeSets several CSS parameters basing on window size
jQuery.toggleImageChanges the image source path with fading effect and loading icon.
zGallery
AJAX calls
getCategoriesSends an AJAX request for list of categories
getAlbumsSends an AJAX request for list of albums
getImagesSends an AJAX request for list of images
AJAX callbacks
ajaxErrorCallback function for AJAX “request error” event.
ajaxCompleteCallback function for AJAX “complete request” event.
ajaxSendCallback function for AJAX “send request” event.
DOM manipulations
fillCategoriesFills the #navUL element with the list of categories.
fillAlbumsFills the #albUL element with the list of albums.
fillImagesFills the #imgUL element with the list of images.
Auxiliary functionsSome repeating code was placed into these functions
fillTopImagesShows the images in full-screen mode
changeTopImageChanges image source path with fading
refreshInterfaceSets several CSS parameters basing on window size

Constants

AJAX_PATH

Path to PHP-files that get/send data from/to DB

jQuery

Summary
Functions
jQuery.document.readyAdjusts several visual (CSS) parameters and interface behaviour (clicks and more).
jQuery.window.resizeSets several CSS parameters basing on window size
jQuery.toggleImageChanges the image source path with fading effect and loading icon.

Functions

jQuery.document.ready

Adjusts several visual (CSS) parameters and interface behaviour (clicks and more).

See Also

<refreshInterface> <getCategories> <fillTopImages> <changeTopImage>

jQuery.window.resize

Sets several CSS parameters basing on window size

jQuery.toggleImage

Changes the image source path with fading effect and loading icon.

Parameters

newSrcNew image source path
durationEffect duration (default: 500ms)

Returns: jQuery object

zGallery

Summary
AJAX calls
getCategoriesSends an AJAX request for list of categories
getAlbumsSends an AJAX request for list of albums
getImagesSends an AJAX request for list of images
AJAX callbacks
ajaxErrorCallback function for AJAX “request error” event.
ajaxCompleteCallback function for AJAX “complete request” event.
ajaxSendCallback function for AJAX “send request” event.
DOM manipulations
fillCategoriesFills the #navUL element with the list of categories.
fillAlbumsFills the #albUL element with the list of albums.
fillImagesFills the #imgUL element with the list of images.
Auxiliary functionsSome repeating code was placed into these functions
fillTopImagesShows the images in full-screen mode
changeTopImageChanges image source path with fading
refreshInterfaceSets several CSS parameters basing on window size

AJAX calls

getCategories

function getCategories()

Sends an AJAX request for list of categories

See Also

fillCategories

getAlbums

function getAlbums(category_id)

Sends an AJAX request for list of albums

See Also

fillAlbums

getImages

function getImages(album_id)

Sends an AJAX request for list of images

See Also

fillImages

AJAX callbacks

ajaxError

function ajaxError(XMLHttpRequest,
textStatus,
errorThrown)

Callback function for AJAX “request error” event.

ajaxComplete

function ajaxComplete(XMLHttpRequest,
textStatus)

Callback function for AJAX “complete request” event.

ajaxSend

function ajaxSend(XMLHttpRequest)

Callback function for AJAX “send request” event.

DOM manipulations

fillCategories

function fillCategories(jsonData)

Fills the #navUL element with the list of categories.  Binds onclick events to the list.

Parameters

jsonDataData from server-side in JSON format with categories information

See Also

getCategories

fillAlbums

function fillAlbums(jsonData)

Fills the #albUL element with the list of albums.  Binds onclick events to the list.

Parameters

jsonDataData from server-side in JSON format with albums information

See Also

getAlbums

fillImages

function fillImages(jsonData)

Fills the #imgUL element with the list of images.  Binds onclick events to the list.

Parameters

jsonDataData from server-side in JSON format with images information

See Also

getImages

Auxiliary functions

Some repeating code was placed into these functions

fillTopImages

function fillTopImages(step)

Shows the images in full-screen mode

Parameters

stepShow the image that is several steps from the current

changeTopImage

function changeTopImage(src)

Changes image source path with fading

Parameters

srcString with new image source path

refreshInterface

function refreshInterface()

Sets several CSS parameters basing on window size

Sends an AJAX request for list of categories
